description: A JUnit 4 style test class designed to verify that the Gradle test runner correctly discovers tests, serving as a compatibility check rather than functional testing.

classes.name: LegacyDiscoveryTest
classes.description: A simple test class to verify test discovery in the build system, ensuring the test runner recognizes test classes.

methods.name: testDiscoveryWorks
methods.description: A test method that always passes, used to confirm test discovery works.
